title: Bitcoin, Bed Bath & Beyond, Walgreens, Exxon: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Bitcoin is extending its decline; Energy companies are gaining premarket on higher crude prices
body:
Stock futures are mixed after Thursday’s technology-driven rout, with Dow futures up and tech shares on course for further losses. Here’s what we’re watching in Thursday’s trading.
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
